members.name: Boise Cascade
members.description: A manufacturer and building materials distributor, Boise Cascade is a large employer in the Treasure Valley area. Their distribution center and main offices in Boise offer career opportunities ranging from trucking to account management.

members.name: J.R. Simplot Company
members.description: J.R. Simplot Company is an Idaho staple, employing thousands of Idahoans. Founded by Idaho native J.R. Simplot, this food production company has helped turn the state into an agricultural powerhouse. If you’re a fan of french fries or chips, chances are good that you’ve eaten a Simplot potato. The headquarters and processing plants for J.R. Simplot are located in Boise.

members.name: Citi Corp
members.description: Citi Corp is a multinational investment bank and financial services corporation. Their Meridian call center is a major employer in the area and is known for good benefits, a wonderful work atmosphere, and excellent workplace culture. According to reviews from employees, Citi Corp is “the best place to work,” and a “very diverse company [with] friendly people to work with.”

members.name: Amalgamated Sugar Company
members.description: You'd be hard-pressed to find a sweeter gig than working for the second-largest sugar manufacturer in the U.S., where they take sugar beets farmed from more than 700 local member farms and refine them into sugar. With around 750 employees, job opportunities are diverse. The range from chemical engineers and crop consultants to warehouse managers and packaging engineers.

members.name: Micron Technology, Inc.
members.description: Another big player in the technology industry, Micron is headquartered in Boise and provides jobs for thousands of Idahoans. With 17 worldwide locations, Micron is a leader in the memory and information sectors, driving innovation and research for over 40 years. What began in a Boise basement in the 1970s has blossomed into a worldwide leader in technology.

members.name: Scentsy
members.description: The wickless candle and scented wax company Scentsy is based in the Treasure Valley and has a beautiful headquarters in Meridian. Scentsy attracts top talent with promises of a fun, fulfilling work environment that puts family first and is “a little offbeat.” From marketing strategists to logistics analysts, job opportunities abound at Scentsy.

members.name: Ataraxis
members.description: Ataraxis is a locally-owned PEO or Professional Employment Organization. As a business consulting and HR management firm, Ataraxis assists other companies with functions such as payroll, employee relations, benefits, compensation, and more.
